title: Full Show (Lakers blown out in preseason opener, Dak injury update, Kareem criticizes Kyrie)
description:
00:00 Lakers blown out by Kings in first preseason game
22:59 Dak still targeting Week 5 return against Rams. Should the Cowboys roll with the hot hand and keep starting Cooper Rush?
56:21 Kareem criticizes Kyrie for promoting conspiracy theories
1:05:31 Jerry Jones says Dak can’t grip the football well enough to play yet
1:19:52 Darvin Ham says Westbrook “will thrive” in the Lakers system
1:31:01 OBJ visits former Giants teammate and tweets about Rodgers. Is he dropping clues about where he will play?
1:43:03 Does the Cowboys defense deserve more credit than Cooper Rush for Dallas starting 3-1?
1:50:22 Ben Simmons makes Nets debut in preseason loss
1:54:33 Kawhi makes his preseason return for the Clippers
